pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ talasattikaṁ uggiranti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.6: “Ime, āvuso, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā amhākaṁ talasattikaṁ uggirantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.8: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ talasattikaṁ uggirissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.9: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ talasattikaṁ uggirathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.12: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ talasattikaṁ uggirissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:1.15.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggireyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.1.10: kāyaṁ vā kāyapaṭibaddhaṁ vā antamaso uppalapattampi uccāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.2.1: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggirati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.2.2: Upasampanne vematiko kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggirati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.2.3: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggirati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc75:2.2.4: Anupasampannassa kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggirati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
